text: Nikolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf und Pottendorf (26 May 1700 – 9 May 1760) was a German religious and social reformer, bishop of the Moravian Church, founder of the Herrnhuter Brüdergemeine, Christian mission pioneer and a major figure of 18th century Protestantism. Category:1700 births Category:1760 deaths Category:Christian hymnwriters Category:Writers from Dresden
title: Nicolaus Zinzendorf
